name: Create new Endorsal contacts from new ActiveCampaign contacts
description:
This template periodically checks for new contacts in ActiveCampaign and uploads them as new contacts into Endorsal.

The template expects your ActiveCampaign contacts to have a phone number which is a mandatory field in Endorsal. If you don't have phone numbers in ActiveCampaign, you will need to at least upload dummy phone number values.

The template is scheduled to run daily at 8:00 am. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
